agency_name: Department for Aging and Rehabilitative Services
series_title: Disability Determination Services: Closed Medicaid Disability Files
series_description: This series documents Medicaid disability files created to determine medical assistance eligibility under Title XIX of the Social Security Act. This series may include, but is not limited to: client allegations of disability, work history, activities of daily living reports, and medical reports to evaluate work related functions.
retention_statement: Retain 1 year after determination of eligibility then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on the schedule cover page.
